headline: Depression Era Corn Chowder
name: Depression Era Corn Chowder
description: This corn chowder is made with just corn, potatoes, chicken broth, evaporated milk, onion and butter.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot over medium heat, combine broth, corn, onion and potatoes. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat, cover and simmer 15 to 20 minutes, until potatoes are just tender.
Stir in evaporated milk and butter until butter is just melted. Season with salt and pepper and serve at once.
